TopicTitle: You must use the object that is on your left hand to save a doomed spaceship.

Articles.Content:
The knob on one of the cabinet doors on my desk... Umm... Hmm... Agh! I'm dead. >.<

... Actually! ... Maybe one of the ships control boards is missing a knob...? xD

My leg.

Dangit.

A battery from an Xbox 360 controller

maybe the ship is out of power and i can restart it

A broken flashlight

At least they can see, if they fix it.

A Hashbrown!

Well, maybe I can use it as fuel?
well...time to have intercourse with a spaceship.
A power strip...No wonder the ship is out of power!
holding up my head, so unsure if mission saved/doomed.

Blankets have a lot of use in space.

Extinguishing a burning control board, insulating living spaces or sensitive equipment so it doesn't overheat/overcool, shading a crew area after losing the sunshield, and that's only the beginning.
A cup of hot coffee.....I could extinguish a fire with it or boil the aliens face away!
Currently twiddling a water pistol around my finger. Are we being attacked by really wimpy aliens?

My chair (left hand)... I throw it out of the side of the ship, when given advanced warning an incoming rock, and change my trajectory!

My mouse (right hand)... I spin the cable around the antenna of the ship and avoid floating off into space on my EVA.

Honestly, I could solve any problem... [crash]

My cat...

CAT. ACTIVATE YOUR LAZORS

PEW PEW PEW.

meow.

yes my cat has lasers in her eyes.
a couch to absorb the shock

My... jaw...

EAT ALL THE SNACKS!!! We must lighten the ship enough to get into orbit! Wait, that'll only make me heavier, cancelling the decrease in mass of snacks...

<Failure>

The carpet. This is a BIG carpet.

Might be able to use it as a rigid blanketthing?

Beef Ravioli

Food emergency?
Umm... this might be weird in same way ,but there is a diesel powered generator. Though it looks old ,and broken we an use it to start up the ship.

A pen?!

I think I would find an use for it

Maybe use it to make calculations? (If there is no calculator nearby)

my left knee

we're doomed

...A notepad.

R.I.P.

The HitchHiker's Guide to the Galaxy ?

DON'T PANIC !
What can a toothbrush, wallet, EHDD and an empty probiotic drink bottle do for my bidding?

My leg...

(But my right hand is on my computer. That could be useful.)
A roll of duct tape, some headphones, and a list of potion recipes for Skyrim.
